entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
